full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, , LJON LEGS RGYAL POS SOGS PA RNAL 'BYOR BA'I PHYI NANG GI DNGOS PO BSRUNG ZHING SKYONG BA'I DKOR BDAG RNAMS LA GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL DON KUN 'GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
